attributes.action: REFERENDUM TO LEAVE THE EUROPEAN UNION
attributes.additional_details:
The public of Britain voted in the past to join a Common Market allowing free trade in Europe. No consent has been sought from the public for the political, financial and legal union that has taken place since then.A vote is long overdue and if allowed and successful would return freedom to this country.
It is ironic that we are fighting in Libya to allow its people freedom to decide their own future but are denied that same right in BRITAIN
